General.Name: Fine DNC Co. Ltd
General.Description: Fine DNC Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells press molds for TC components worldwide. It offers top and bottom chassis, S/C converters and controls, brackets, and chassis bars for electronics; and cover pipes, bracket covers and bases, base heaters, console support brackets, shroud keys, body panels, tailgates, basic plates, arms, hood and body sites, front and rear covers, EPB brackets, spacers, CTR mtg products, armrests, RR brackets, duckt bracket air vents, RR bracket HPB and EPB products, and lower and upper consoles for automobiles. The company also provides molds for semiconductors and drones. Fine DNC Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Asan-si, South Korea.
